src:
Pokalna tolažba za Oplast
04 Nov 2019, 11:22 by Igor Mušič

Prvoligaški premor so ekipe dvoranskega nogometa izkoristile za igranje tekem osmine finala slovenskega pokala.



Foto: Zdravko Primožič/FPA

Slovenski pokal v dvoranskem nogometu - sicer po pokrovitelju imenovan kot pokal Terme Olimia - je lani osvojil Dobovec, ki je - tako kot polfinalista Litija in škofijski Bronx - neposredni udeleženec četrtfinala. To mesto je bilo zagotovljeno tudi za finaliste iz Maribora, ki pa so že poleti propadli.
Tako je osmina finala dobila še dodaten dvoboj za mesto, ki so ga izpraznili Mariborčani. Uspeh v osmini finala pokala je vsaj začasna tolažba za kobariški Oplast, ki je v prvi ligi še vedno pri dnu. Tokrat so Kobaridci na gostovanju v Zagorju ob Savi zanesljivo opravili z najboljšim drugoligašem, z ekipo Mlinše. Domačini so bolje začeli, a je pred polčasom Kobaridce z izenačenjem v igro vrnil Nejc Kovačič. Ključni trenutki za Primorce so se zgodili v začetku drugega polčasa, ko je za Oplast mrežo hitro dvakrat zatresel Jurij Kikelj.
Četrtfinala se veseli tudi Kix iz Ajdovščine, ki je v domači dvorani v drugoligaškem obračunu izločil Meteorplast iz Ljutomera. Ajdovci so imeli ves čas rezultatsko pobudo, odločilni zadetek pa je po drugem izenačenju gostov dosegel Anej Batistič.
Rezultati
Pokal Terme Olimia, osmina finala (igrali so eno tekmo) - Mlinše : Oplast Kobarid 3:5 (1:1); strelci - 1:0 Džombić (6), 1:1 Kovačič (17), 1:2 Kikelj (25), 1:3 Kikelj (27), 2:3 Močnik Guna (27), 2:4 Kovačič (30), 2:5 Konavec (34., 3:5 Močnik Guna (35); Extrem : Tomaž 1:7, Miklavž : Sevnica 4:6, Kix : Meteoplast 3:2 (2:2); strelci - 1:0 Sukanović (8), 1:1 Cener (10), 2:1 Sluga (14), 2:2 Horvat (20),3:2 Batistič (25), Siliko : Stripy 6:1.
Četrtfinalisti so Dobovec (lanski prvak), Litija, Bronx (polfinalista, vsi neposredno uvrščeni), Oplast, Tomaž, Sevnica, Kix in Siliko.
text:
Cup consolation for Oplast
04 Nov 2019, 11:22 by Igor Mušič

Indoor soccer teams used the indoor soccer teams to play the matches of the eighth finals of the Slovenian Cup.



Photo: Zdravko Primozic / FPA

The Slovenian Indoor Soccer Cup - named after the Terme Olimia Cup - was won last year by Dobovec, who - like the semi-finalist Litija and the Diocesan Bronx - is a direct participant in the quarterfinals. This place was also provided for the finalists from Maribor, who had already failed in the summer.
Thus, the eighth finals won an additional match for the city, which was vacated by Maribor citizens. Success in the eighth Cup final is at least a temporary consolation for Kobarid Oplast, who is still near the bottom in the first league. This time, the Kobarid team played with Zagorje ob Savi with their best runner-up, the Mlinše team. The hosts got off to a better start, but before halftime Kobaridce returned Nejc Kovacic with a tie. The key moments for the Primoraks came at the beginning of the second half, when Yuri Kikelj was quickly hit twice by the Oplast net.
The quarterfinals are also looking forward to Kix from Ajdovščina, who eliminated the Meteorplast from Ljutomer in the home court in the second leg. Ajdovci had the result of the result all the time, and Anej Batisti scored the decisive goal after the second equalization of the guests.
Results
Terme Olimia Cup, Round of 16 (played one game) - Mlinše: Oplast Kobarid 3: 5 (1: 1); scorers - 1: 0 Dzombic (6), 1: 1 Kovacic (17), 1: 2 Kikelj (25), 1: 3 Kikelj (27), 2: 3 Munchnik Guna (27), 2: 4 Kovacic (30) , 2: 5 Konavec (34th, 3: 5 Strongman Guna (35); Extrem: Tomaž 1: 7, Miklavz: Sevnica 4: 6, Kix: Meteoplast 3: 2 (2: 2); shooters - 1: 0 Sukanovic (8), 1: 1 Cener (10), 2: 1 Servant (14), 2: 2 Horvath (20), 3: 2 Batista (25), Silico: Stripy 6: 1.
The quarterfinalists are Dobovec (last year's champion), Litija, Bronx (semi-finalist, all directly ranked), Oplast, Tomaž, Sevnica, Kix and Siliko.
